id-38528.title: Wedding Organizer
id-38528.post-content:
The Wedding Organizer template has a romantic feel that’s balanced with a business layout to combine the two things visitors want to see. It’s light, welcoming and charming in equal measure.

The template uses a combination of content and imagery that helps paint the picture of the perfect wedding, while promoting your products and services. It’s an exceptional template that should make conversion easy!

Key features of the Wedding Organizer template

  • Romantic website design ideal for the wedding niche
  • Uses plenty of imagery and nice layout to engage
  • Includes lots of opportunity to showcase products and services
  • Readymade pages are ideal for the wedding niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-38528.post-excerpt: Romantic website design that’s designed to convert, ideal for the wedding industry

id-56689.title: Chartered Accountant
id-56689.post-content:
The Chartered Accountant template avoids the usual seriousness of the niche while building the authority it needs using modern design and a bright blue color.

The template reflects a calm competence we would want from an accountant without being too sober. There is plenty of whitespace and flexible content areas to cover products, services and expertise while creating an inclusive vibe that draws you in.

Key features of the Chartered Accountant template

  • Bold blue color makes a statement without overbearing
  • Design communicated competence without being too serious
  • Lots of opportunities to showcase products and services
  • Readymade pages covering most needs
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-56689.post-excerpt: Well-designed web template with fetching colors ideal for any business or profession

id-38488.title: Massage Therapist
id-38488.post-content:
The Massage Therapist template has that serene feel you want to evoke in future clients alongside the information you need to provide to convert them into customers.

The template is a relaxed mix of purple and white that creates engagement as well as a feeling of luxury. There’s lots of whitespace and a strong product section in the center.

Key features of the Massage Therapist template

  • Nice color combination creates the feeling of a lifestyle
  • Attractive service section in the center of the page
  • Additional pages ideal for massage therapists
  • Flexible content areas to add or change what’s already there
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-38488.post-excerpt: Relaxed, modern website template ideal for massage therapists and spa businesses

id-38418.title: Personal Dietitian
id-38418.post-content:
The Personal Dietitian template is a stylish design that uses a green color to provide reassurance alongside whitespace and alternating dark and light backgrounds. It’s a simple and very effective look.

The template includes all the essential ingredients a dietitian or nutritionist would want to share including products, services, recipes, consultation information and calls to action. There’s also a readymade blog section for you to engage further.

Key features of the Personal Dietitian template

  • Composed design ideal for dietitians or nutritionists
  • Includes areas to share products, services, consultations and more
  • Readymade blog page so you can begin communicating with your audience
  • Attractive contact form to help consultation signups
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-38418.post-excerpt: Composed website template ideal for dietitians, nutritionists or consultants

id-34226.title: Photographer
id-34226.post-content:
The Photographer website template opens in an exceptional way with an awesome graphic and headline. Scroll through the parallax effects to access content areas where you can tell your story and outline your products and services.

This is a very creative template with plenty of white space to offset strong imagery and lots of opportunities to promote your work and engage the audience with some high quality images and graphics.

Key features of the Photographer template

  • Awesome introduction thanks to that graphical header
  • Nice parallax effect that adds a touch of style
  • Great fonts used throughout the template
  • Lots of opportunities to use images
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-34226.post-excerpt: Creative web template that’s ideal for painters, photographers and visual artists

id-34326.title: Animal Welfare
id-34326.post-content:
The Animal Welfare template uses a bold full screen shaded image and contrasting colors to make an impact. The image sets the scene perfectly while the white and orange fonts ensure your message is heard loud and clear.

The overall design lightens up after that header, with a light, bright feel that encourages you to explore. Flexible content areas and extra pages provide the opportunity to state your case, tell your story and encourage giving.

Key features of the Animal Welfare template

  • Impactful design with bold full screen header section
  • Contrasting dark and white with orange colors work well
  • Example pages are all relevant to charities and nonprofits
  • Attractive contact page with engagement opportunities
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-34326.post-excerpt: Impactful web template with strong introduction and all the ingredients you need

id-33461.title: Dentist Clinic
id-33461.post-content:
The Dentist Clinic website template is a clean, modern design with reassuring colors and fonts and a contact form front and center. The blue and green are classic medical colors and combine well with the white.

The rest of the design provides areas to tell your story, outline products and services and patient testimonials. There are also attractive calls to action throughout, everything you need to build a website for a practice.

Key features of the Dentist Clinic template

  • Uses colors we automatically relate to medicine
  • Excellent layout with lots of content areas and whitespace
  • Includes common content areas a dentist would require
  • Attractive calls to action throughout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-33461.post-excerpt: Well-designed template ideal for dentists, clinics and medical practices

id-87376.title: BBQ Restaurant
id-87376.post-content:
The Restaurant BBQ template is an atmospheric web design that helps build an appetite for your food and your business. The bold dark design is softened by white typography and a bright contrast color and uses parallax scrolling to add a touch of style.

The default design could work well for BBQ joints, food trucks, restaurants and any type of food business. You can change everything you see on the page, from the header to the footer using built-in tools or popular builders.

Key features of the BBQ Restaurant template

  • Atmospheric template for food businesses
  • Nice layout with smooth flow down the page
  • Parallax scrolling makes the design stand out
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-87376.post-excerpt: The Restaurant BBQ template helps create an appetite for your food business

id-87446.title: Fashion Blogger
id-87446.post-content:
The Fashion Blog template delivers the features you need to launch an engaging website where you can engage, share stories and discuss fashion and beauty. The design is stylish, attractive and can be fully customized to your taste using WordPress or your favorite page builder.

The Fashion Blog template looks professional and delivers the quality of design you expect from fashion. It’s the perfect partner to help you create an engaging blog that can help create authority in the fashion or beauty niche.

Key features of the Fashion Blogger template

  • Stylish design ideal for fashion and beauty
  • Smart blog layout with some nice touches
  • Everything can be customized
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-87446.post-excerpt: The Fashion Blog template is a stylish design ideal for fashion and beauty

id-87543.title: Flower Shop
id-87543.post-content:
The Flower Shop template is a pro-quality eCommerce template that can promote your store and sell online at the same time. It is well-designed, flexible and fully customizable so you can tweak it to fit your brand using your favorite page builder or the WordPress editor.

The Flower Shop template is fast, easy to use and fully responsive. It will look amazing on any screen size while providing a smooth customer experience. It’s everything a florist or flower shop needs to thrive online.

Key features of the Flower Shop template

  • Welcome eCommerce template for florists and flower shops
  • Fully customizable design
  • Nice default layout with attractive product pages
  • Simple to install and set up
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-87543.post-excerpt: The Flower Shop template is ideal for budding florists and flower shops
